}
java.put('last',last);
result;

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var data = [];
var list = java.getElements('.chapter-list.1').select('li');
for (i in list) {
    data.push({
        'index': String(list[i].select('a').attr('href')).replace(/.*?\/(\d+)\..*?$/, '$1'),
        'title': list[i].select('a').text(),
        'link': list[i].select('a').attr('href')
    });
}
data.sort((a, b) => parseInt(a.index) - parseInt(b.index));
data;
</js>
